title: How to Make Impossible Pumpkin Pie

steps.headline: Spray a 9-inch pie plate with nonstick cooking spray.
Add all the ingredients to a mixing bowl and mix until blended.
steps.description: You can also dump all the ingredients into a food processor bowl and complete the task.

steps.headline: Pour the blended pumpkin mixture into the prepared pie pan.
Bake 35 to 40 minutes or until a metal knife inserted in the pie center comes out clean.
Remove the pie from the oven and let cool 30 minutes.
Refrigerate for 3 hours, or overnight, before serving.
Serve with sweetened whipped cream, if desired.

text: Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Spray a 9-inch pie plate with nonstick cooking spray.  Add all the ingredients to a mixing bowl and mix until blended. You can also dump all the ingredients into a food processor bowl and complete the task. Pour the blended pumpkin mixture into the prepared pie pan.  Bake 35 to 40 minutes or until a metal knife inserted in the pie center comes out clean.  Remove the pie from the oven and let cool 30 minutes.  Refrigerate for 3 hours, or overnight, before serving.  Serve with sweetened whipped cream, if desired.
